MAY  EVENTS  -  2025
Event List View
Upcoming Events
Past Events
May
1
Live Music
Thursday, May 1, 2025
8:00 PM
10:00 PM
Spatz
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
LIVE MUSIC AT SPATZ
Thursday at 8pm will feature Adam Moreno on guitar with  his amazing playlist LIVE at Spatz not to be missed.
For the enjoyment of everyone Spatz is now a smoke and vape free environment, please note smoking is till permitted on our re-imagined patio while taking advantage of our amazing outside bar. SPATZ continues to demonstrate our commitment to provide a welcoming and responsible environment for all our customers and friends.
View Event →
Apr
1
Founders Day
Tuesday, April 1, 2025
11:00 AM
11:45 PM
Spatz
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
Gerry, the founder of Spatz Sports Bar, established the venue 45 years ago with a plan to create a welcoming space for sports enthusiasts and casual diners alike. Driven by his passion for sports and community, he transformed a modest building into a vibrant gathering place where friends could come together to enjoy sports, great bar food, and a party atmosphere. From the outset, Gerry ensured that Spatz would become a cornerstone of Winter Park culture.and a rite of passage for many and has evolved into a beloved establishment, cherished by patrons through generations.. Please come and celebrate with us and remember the man who started it all.
View Event →
Mar
15
Peanut Lovers Day
Saturday, March 15, 2025
11:00 AM
11:55 PM
Spatz
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
On National Peanut Lovers Day, Skrewball Peanut Butter Whiskey offers a unique celebration of flavors that combine the rich essence of whiskey with the delightful taste of peanut butter, making it a perfect companion for those who appreciate the nutty goodness of peanuts. Whether enjoyed neat, on the rocks, or as a key ingredient in creative cocktails, Skrewball invites fans to explore new ways to indulge in their favorite nutty treat, elevating ordinary moments into memorable experiences.
View Event →
Mar
14
Bushmills Tribute to Saint Patrick
Friday, March 14, 2025
11:00 AM
11:55 PM
Spatz
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
Bushmills Irish Whiskey stands as a delightful tribute to St. Patrick's Day, embodying the rich heritage and craftsmanship of Ireland. Crafted in the oldest licensed distillery in the world, established in 1608, Bushmills produces a smooth and balanced whiskey that highlights the essence of the Emerald Isle. With notes of honey sweetness, vanilla, and a hint of spice, this whiskey serves as a perfect companion for festive celebrations. Whether sipped neat, on the rocks, or enjoyed in a classic Irish coffee, Bushmills invites everyone to raise a glass and toast to the spirit of friendship and revelry that defines this beloved holiday.
View Event →
Mar
14
to Mar 17
Saint Patrick's Weekend
Fri, Mar 14, 2025
11:00 AM
Mon, Mar 17, 2025
11:55 PM
Spatz
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
Join us for an unforgettable St. Patrick's Day all weekend at Spatz Sports Bar! Indulge in Dr Phil’s delicious corned beef and cabbage, paired perfectly with a shot or two of what else but Jameson Irish whiskey. Celebrate with friends and enjoy the lively atmosphere filled with shenanigans and drinks specials that will keep the spirit of the holiday alive. Don’t miss out on this opportunity to raise a glass and celebrate Irish culture with great food and good company! Enjoy the Craic with us.
View Event →
Mar
7
to Mar 28
Fish and Chip Friday
Fri, Mar 7, 2025
11:05 AM
Fri, Mar 28, 2025
3:00 PM
Spatz
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
Every Friday through March, enjoy Dr. Phil's delicious fish and chips at Spatz Sports Bar. This dish features crispy, GUINNESS battered fish and golden fries, making it a standout classic item that attracts both regulars and newcomers. Pair it with a cold beer for a perfect lunch
View Event →
Feb
28
to Mar 4
Mardis Gras Weekend
Fri, Feb 28, 2025
11:00 AM
Tue, Mar 4, 2025
11:55 PM
Spatz
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
Spatz Sports Bar is set to celebrate Mardi Gras with an exciting party weekend that brings the vibrant spirit of New Orleans to Winter Park. Guests can indulge in a delicious offering of Dr Phil’s authentic gumbo, featuring a rich blend of spices, vegetables, and proteins simmered to perfection. The festive atmosphere will be enhanced with beads, swag, tastings and drinks specials, creating an immersive experience for your party crew . Whether you're a Mardi Gras veteran or new to the celebration, Spatz invites everyone to join in the festivities and savor the flavors of this beloved tradition. “Laissez le bon temps rouler”
View Event →
Feb
27
National Chili Day
Thursday, February 27, 2025
11:00 AM
11:55 PM
Spatz
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
Come and join us for National Chili Day at Spatz Sports Bar for  a flavor packed experience! Enjoy our rich, hearty chili made from fresh ingredients, perfect for warming up on a winter day. we have the perfect bowl for you. Pair your chili with our selection of craft beers or with an amazing  JACK DANIELS for a complete experience. Come on over to SPATZ for a vibrant atmosphere, where you can enjoy great food and drinks while catching your favorite sports action.
View Event →
Feb
22
National Margarita Day
Saturday, February 22, 2025
11:00 AM
11:55 PM
Spatz
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
Celebrate National Margarita Day with a refreshing twist at Spatz Sports Bar! Join us to indulge in expertly crafted margaritas featuring PATRON TEQUILA, known for its exceptional quality and smooth flavor.
Bring your friends and raise a glass to this beloved cocktail! Whether you prefer it classic or with a twist, our crew are ready to serve you the perfect margarita. Don't miss out on this festive occasion to savor the rich flavors of PATRON TEQUILA!
View Event →
Feb
16
Hospitality Appreciation Event
Sunday, February 16, 2025
7:00 PM
11:55 PM
Spatz
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
Calling all Hospitality workers, please join us at SPATZ  from 7pm for our appreciation of your service to the community. Premium brands will be on site to allow you to enjoy tastings and as an added thank you please sign up for our exclusive SPATZ hospitality discount card.
View Event →
Feb
9
The BIG Game
Sunday, February 9, 2025
11:00 AM
11:55 PM
Spatz
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
Join us at Spatz Sports Bar for an exciting viewing experience of THE BIG GAME. Enjoy every moment of the game on our 11 big screens while you chow down on  delicious game time food and refreshing drinks specials. Gather your friends and cheer for your favorite team in the fantastic  atmosphere of SPATZ. Don’t miss out on the action—join us for this thrilling event!
View Event →
Jan
27
to Jan 31
Jameson Irish Whiskey
Mon, Jan 27, 2025
11:00 AM
Fri, Jan 31, 2025
11:55 PM
Spatz
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
This has got to be one of the most famous pairings we offer. Not only do we have the outstanding Jameson triple distilled Irish Whiskey but also on Friday the phenomenal Corned Beef by Dr Phil. Those n the know will understand!!
View Event →
Jan
25
Burns Celebration
Saturday, January 25, 2025
11:00 AM
11:55 PM
Spatz
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
Burns celebration, also known as Burns Night honors Scottish poet Robert Burns. At SPATZ we will feature a traditional snack of Scotch Egg to be enjoyed with Glenlivet a delicious single malt scotch whisky. since 1824 matured in American and European Oak casks While Rabbie did not live long enough to experience the unique taste of Glenlivet we can imagine he would be proud of our Scottish heritage.We will be wearing our Kilts will you ?
View Event →
Jan
20
to Jan 24
Bulleit Bourbon
Mon, Jan 20, 2025
11:00 AM
Fri, Jan 24, 2025
11:55 PM
Spatz
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
No-1 with a Bulleit this week we feature Bulleit Bourbon small batch bourbon whiskey from Kentucky and to pair with this amazing Bourbon Whiskey Dr Phil is going all out on Friday with his famous Irish Baby Back Ribs.
View Event →

13
to Jan 17
Teremana & Jagermeister
Mon, Jan 13, 2025
10:55 AM
Fri, Jan 17, 2025
11:55 PM
Spatz
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
All this week Teremana Tequila and Jagermeister will be on hand with classic drinks specials swag and tastings.
Dr Phil brings his inventive A game on Friday with Duck Quesadilla
View Event →
Jan
6
to Jan 10
Bacardi & Patron Tequila
Mon, Jan 6, 2025
11:00 AM
Fri, Jan 10, 2025
11:55 PM
Spatz
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
This week we feature the iconic brands of Bacardi and Patron Tequila with drinks specials each day, swag and tastings.
Dr Phil will add his touch to this week with Pork Tenderloin served with black beans and rice.
View Event →
Jan
1
New Years Day Football
Wednesday, January 1, 2025
11:00 AM
11:55 PM
Spatz
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
OK ,2024 is now firmly  in the rear view mirror, but we still have football and we will be showing all the major games today across our 11 big screens. Normal hours resume and our football menu will be a great change from holiday food. So get out of the house and come and see us at SPATZ
View Event →
Dec
31
New Years Party
Tuesday, December 31, 2024
11:00 AM
11:55 PM
Spatz
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
SPATZ is the best place to ring in 2025, with Champagne toast at midnight and open right through until 2am, say goodby to 2024 with us , New Year resolutions can wait until later.
View Event →
Dec
25
Christmas Day
Wednesday, December 25, 2024
5:00 PM
11:55 PM
Spatz
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
MERRY CHRISTMAS AND HAPPY HOLIDAYS to all our amazing customers. SPATZ will open at 5pm today right up until 2am.
SPATZ is a guilt free zone so don’t be embarrassed by wearing those novelty festive socks you got for Christmas!!. We don’t judge !
View Event →
Dec
24
Spatz Christmas Eve Party Time
Tuesday, December 24, 2024
11:00 AM
11:55 PM
Spatz
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
We know you guys never need and excuse to “PARTY” and Christmas Eve is a classic occasion. and the BEST place to party is always SPATZ. So please come and celebrate with your favorite crew until long past Santa’s bedtime.
View Event →
Dec
22
Christmas Ugly Sweater Competition
Sunday, December 22, 2024
11:00 AM
11:55 PM
Spatz
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
Dust off the moth balls  and reach into the back of your closet for your most outrageous Christmas Sweater and head over to SPATZ to enter our UGLY CHRISTMAS SWEATER COMETTITION. sponsored by Jack Daniels. Bar tab prizes for both day and night entries as well as swag and fun with our bar crew. See you later.
View Event →
Dec
21
National Burger Day
Saturday, December 21, 2024
11:05 AM
11:55 PM
Spatz
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
If you have never tried one before then this  is a great opportunity to sample one the the best burgers in Orlando and at a great price.
Our smash burgers have won rave reviews from customers and are now a firm favorite on all our menus. Come and try one today for only $10
View Event →
Dec
12
to Dec 24
12 Days of Christmas Deals
Thu, Dec 12, 2024
11:05 AM
Tue, Dec 24, 2024
11:55 PM
Spatz
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
From December 12th to December 24th each day we will be featuring deals by these top brands. TEREMANA TEQUILA - GREY GOOSE VODKA - JAMESON IRISH WHISKEY - D’USSE COGNAC - SKYY VODKA - JAGERMEISTER - CROWN ROYAL -SKREWBALL - ALTOS TEQUILA - BOMBAY SAPPHIRE - PATRON TEQUILA - BACARDI SUPERIOR culminating in the drawing of a raffle to win one of three amazing baskets packed with goodies from JIM BEAM - GREY GOOSE AND CODIGO. Tickets are only $5 on sale through the 12 days. Swag tastings and deals will be offered each day giving you even more reasons to visit SPATZ arrive early and stay late.
View Event →
Dec
12
to Dec 24
12 Days of Christmas Raffle
Thu, Dec 12, 2024
11:00 AM
Tue, Dec 24, 2024
11:55 PM
Spatz
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
In aid of the Second Harvest Food Bank, SPATZ will be holding a raffle during the 12 days of Christmas .
Supported by GREY GOOSE - JIM BEAM and CODIGO there will be three baskets to be won packed with goodies from these major brands. With tickets of sale for only $5 why stop at one!
Draw takes place at SPATZ on December 24th
View Event →
Dec
6
Bartenders Appreciation  Day
Friday, December 6, 2024
11:00 AM
11:55 PM
Spatz
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
Our amazing Spatz crew provide  you with  great service all year round so please come and show your appreciation for your favorite bartender today.
View Event →
Dec
5
Repeal of Prohibition
Thursday, December 5, 2024
11:00 AM
11:55 PM
Spatz
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
Prohibition ended on this day in 1933 ending years of forced abstinence. So what better way to celebrate this day than with Jack Daniels, served as a cocktail or shot Jack was born to make amazing whiskey for over 150 years.
View Event →
Dec
1
to Dec 31
Egg Nogg
Sun, Dec 1, 2024
11:00 AM
Tue, Dec 31, 2024
11:55 PM
Spatz
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
In our opinion the best EGG NOG you can buy, we ill be serving Evan Williams Egg Nog all though December for only $5 to keep you in the festive spirit.
View Event →
Nov
29
Black Friday
Friday, November 29, 2024
11:00 AM
11:55 PM
Spatz
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
This is not just any Black Friday Sale this is how SPATZ do Black FRIDAY! So while stocks last we will be selling selected bottles for only $10 (plus tax togo sales only). This is the perfect time to refill your personal liquor stocks at great prices.
Come early they will sell out fast !
View Event →
Nov
28
Thanksgiving
Thursday, November 28, 2024
5:00 PM
11:55 PM
Spatz
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
We will open at 5pm today - HAPPY THANKSGIVING to all our customers and friends from Dr Phil and the SPATZ team.

11:55 PM

(map)

Apr
1
Founders Day
Tuesday, April 1, 2025
11:00 AM
11:45 PM
Spatz
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
Gerry, the founder of Spatz Sports Bar, established the venue 45 years ago with a plan to create a welcoming space for sports enthusiasts and casual diners alike. Driven by his passion for sports and community, he transformed a modest building into a vibrant gathering place where friends could come together to enjoy sports, great bar food, and a party atmosphere. From the outset, Gerry ensured that Spatz would become a cornerstone of Winter Park culture.and a rite of passage for many and has evolved into a beloved establishment, cherished by patrons through generations.. Please come and celebrate with us and remember the man who started it all.

On National Peanut Lovers Day, Skrewball Peanut Butter Whiskey offers a unique celebration of flavors that combine the rich essence of whiskey with the delightful taste of peanut butter, making it a perfect companion for those who appreciate the nutty goodness of peanuts. Whether enjoyed neat, on the rocks, or as a key ingredient in creative cocktails, Skrewball invites fans to explore new ways to indulge in their favorite nutty treat, elevating ordinary moments into memorable experiences.

Mar
14
Bushmills Tribute to Saint Patrick
Friday, March 14, 2025
11:00 AM
11:55 PM
Spatz
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
Bushmills Irish Whiskey stands as a delightful tribute to St. Patrick's Day, embodying the rich heritage and craftsmanship of Ireland. Crafted in the oldest licensed distillery in the world, established in 1608, Bushmills produces a smooth and balanced whiskey that highlights the essence of the Emerald Isle. With notes of honey sweetness, vanilla, and a hint of spice, this whiskey serves as a perfect companion for festive celebrations. Whether sipped neat, on the rocks, or enjoyed in a classic Irish coffee, Bushmills invites everyone to raise a glass and toast to the spirit of friendship and revelry that defines this beloved holiday.

Spatz Sports Bar is set to celebrate Mardi Gras with an exciting party weekend that brings the vibrant spirit of New Orleans to Winter Park. Guests can indulge in a delicious offering of Dr Phil’s authentic gumbo, featuring a rich blend of spices, vegetables, and proteins simmered to perfection. The festive atmosphere will be enhanced with beads, swag, tastings and drinks specials, creating an immersive experience for your party crew . Whether you're a Mardi Gras veteran or new to the celebration, Spatz invites everyone to join in the festivities and savor the flavors of this beloved tradition. “Laissez le bon temps rouler”
